com.apdplat.platform.action

类 ExtJSSimpleAction<T extends Model>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.apdplat.platform.common.DataPrivilegeControl
      • com.apdplat.platform.action.ActionSupport
        • com.apdplat.platform.action.ExtJSActionSupport
          • com.apdplat.platform.action.ExtJSSimpleAction<T>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Action
    直接已知子类:
    BackupLogAction, DicAction, DicItemAction, EditCommandAction, EditModuleAction, IndexLogAction, MemoryStateAction, ModuleAction, OperateLogAction, OrgAction, PositionAction, ProcessTimeAction, RoleAction, RuningTimeAction, UserAction, UserGroupAction, UserLoginAction

    public abstract class ExtJSSimpleAction<T extends Model>
extends ExtJSActionSupport
implements Action
    控制器接口的抽象实现类 支持EXT JS
    作者:
    杨尚川
